title: Business Intelligence (BI) Leader – Leading Production Company – Vienna – Austria
body:
Salary
Competitive Salary Package
Location
Austria Europe Vienna
Post Date
24 May 2020
Employment Type
Full Time
Job Number
12243
Line of Business
IT Audit, Technology & Cyber Security
Consultant
Diana Dumitrascu


Our Client is a leading production company based in Vienna, Austria. We are currently seeking a Business Intelligence Leader who will be responsible for supervising a team of technical and functional experts reporting directly to the Group CFO.

Business Intelligence (BI) Leader Job Responsibilities:

  • Driving the development of BI Solutions
  • Leading implementation projects, monitoring performance tools across different business lines
  • KPI improvements
  • Developing strategies for BI tools, making data available throughout the business
  • Creating pricing models and rollout of software solutions to support sales
  • Liaison with stakeholders the organization, presenting and communicating BI Solutions.

Profile:

  • Degree in Information Technology or another relevant discipline
  • Proven technical knowledge of database design and management
  • Minimum of 4 years experience in BI solution development
  • Excellent knowledge of SQL database
  • SAP or other ERP system experience
  • Proven leadership experience
  • Very good analytical and conceptual skills.

If you are interested in this position, please send an up-to-date CV to Diana Dumitrascu at diana@renaix.com.
